#jQuery portlet API documentation.

= Introduction =

This descripes jQuery Portlet API

= new methods for jQuery =

|| Method || Description || Example ||
|| registerPortlet|| registers portlet to page|| ||
|| portletByNameSpace|| find's registered portlet object by namespace || ||
|| searchPortlet|| search portlet || ||
|| portletCount|| How many portlets are registered to page || ||
|| portlets|| Returns all portlets on page on array || ||



= $.Portlet object =

== Member methods == 

|| Method || Description || Example ||
|| query || make jQuery inside portlet || {{{ mThis.query("button"); }}} ||
|| $ || make jQuery inside portlet. Shorter version of query method. || {{{ mThis.$("button"); }}} ||
|| nameSpace || returns portlet namespace of this object || {{{ mThis.nameSpace }}} ||
